item.title: BattleDot: An Exercise in Networked Multi-threading
item.description:
Using C as the primary programming language, I developed both server and client components that handle game logic and player interactions. The game simulates a scenario where each player targets the next in a circular sequence, attempting to locate and destroy a single-dot ship on their opponent’s grid.

Roadmap

  • Thread-safe Logging
  • Unit Testing
  • Fuzz Testing
  • Integration Testing
  • Cross-Platform Compatibility
  • CI/CD Pipeline
  • Serialization
  • Docs
  • TUI?
